ygData.subject: Re: Re: 16th Pet and 20pet
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as I know, Dwarf skeletons DON T have a negative faction hit against the gnome necro guild. The only things I have found that do are the decaying gnome
ygData.messageBody:
As far as I know, Dwarf skeletons DON'T have a negative faction hit against
the gnome necro guild. The only things I have found that do are the decaying
gnome skeletons and some of the gnome skeletons.

Macabre, gnome Necromancer (Bertoxxulous server)

----- Original Message -----
From: <TkAdam@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 1:35 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: 16th Pet and 20pet


> From: TkAdam@...
>
> In a message dated 7/16/99 1:09:28 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
> jspectre@... writes:
>
> > I thought killing the undead at Lake Rathe would cause some horrible
faction
> > change and get you banished from the guild or something? I'm a Dark
Elf,
> > maybe
> > it only applies to DE's? Can someone confirm or debunk this? Thanks.
> >
>
> Putrid Skeletons (except in befallen) have bertoxxis(sp) faction (the god
of
> disease) Killing them will get you in bad light of the necro guild in
Qeynos.
>
> Dwarf Skeletons have bad faction against the gnome necro guild.
>
> Those or the only skeletal bad faction hits (what does it hurt to have bad
> unrest or befallen faction...) that I know of.
>
> Sonoroud Tomebinder.
